900870.name: Super Dig Man Deluxe
900870.description: Super Dig Man deluxe is a digging game where you search for ores, rocks, gems and gold in order to upgrade your tools, buy ladders, and buy torches. everything is procedurally generated in a 2 dimensional tile-like fashion. it is a simple yet satisfying game that does not take long to complete but will be enjoyable for players of all ages. search for the arkenstone to win the game! Please install Java for the game to work.
